total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the areas in the input grid that are surrounded by the same number.
Q2: Determine the number that surrounds each area identified in Q1.
Q3: Identify the pattern of transformation from the input grid to the output grid in the examples.
Q4: Apply the transformation pattern identified in Q3 to the areas identified in Q1 of the quiz input grid.
Q5: Determine if there are any additional transformations or patterns that need to be applied to the rest of the grid.
Q6: Apply any additional transformations or patterns identified in Q5 to the quiz input grid.
Q1: Identify the areas in the input grid that are surrounded by the same number.
Q2: Determine the number that surrounds each area identified in Q1.
Q3: Identify the number that is inside each area identified in Q1.
Q4: Determine the transformation rule from the examples given. In this case, the transformation rule is to replace the number inside the area with the number that surrounds it plus 1.
Q5: Apply the transformation rule to the areas identified in the quiz input grid.
